comment.author: 45586426@N06
comment._content: Possibly three US Navy Grumman AD-6 Skyraider in overall Gloss Sea Blue Possibly from VA-175 ‘Devils Diplomats’ of Carrier Air Group Seventeen (CVG-17) circa 1955 - 1956, from Modex side codes in 400 range when the squadron was deployed aboard CVA-43 USS Coral Sea or CVA-42 Franklin D Roosevelt. www.gonavy.jp/CVG-CVG17f.html www.gonavy.jp/navy/sqn/VA175.html (above info courtesy Takafumi Hiroe, citizen of Japan and naval aviation historian) Codes 410, 412 & 416. Also carrying what may be small radar pods below wings. VA-175 was based at NAS Jacksonville Texas.
